about.homeQuote: Bringing beautifully designed experiences to life through coding, testing, and just the right amount of technical magic. More about me »
about.aboutQuote: My name is Brandon Morse. I am a New Jersey-based, developer with a passion to innovate and to create a better web. I've worked with many great clients, such as: Walmart, Ikea, Lenovo, The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, and more! Pushing the digital envelope, my analytical and creative thinking drives me to bridge the gap between client fantasies and digital realities to bring incredible interactive experiences to life.
about.aboutDetails:
I am currently working as the Technology Director at GSW Advertising, a Syneos Health company, based in Newtown, PA. As Technology Director, I oversee the code and system architecture, build strategy, and best practices for the execution of developmental projects as well. While I oversee a team in the Newtown office, I also consult on development needs across all agencies in the Syneos network.

I graduated from The Art Institute of Philadelphia with a Bachelor of Science in Multimedia and Web Design in 2005. My education didn't end there. Since then I've obtained various certifications from Google, Veeva, HubSpot and most recently the AWS Alexa Skill Builder certification. With the digital landscape growing at such a rapid pace, I am always reading articles, taking courses, and learning new technologies and methodologies to stay up-to-date on the latest things. The ongoing education fuels my passion to innovate and create a better web.

Over the course of my career, I've lead many teams of developers of various sizes, both in-house as well as located throughout the world. Collaborating with many teams such as Design, Strategy, UX, QA, and even Operations has been instrumental in my success. Understanding each domain's goals allows me to scope, communicate risk and deliver within the timeline defined.
about.caseStudiesQuote: Bridging the gap between client fantasies and digital realities.
about.trackRecordQuote: With over 15 years of experience, I have demonstrated success in communicating technical/complex information in understandable language to non-technical and technical personnel; plan and execute presentations, write proposals, system documentation and client reference materials.

workHistory.title: Director of Technology and Development
notableSuccesses: Spearheaded a successful server migration, reducing the monthly spend by 92%.
Developed and implemented an interactive QA process.
Executed 'work-flex' and 'work-remote' initiatives allowing employees to gain better control over their work-life balance.
Oversaw and mentored a team of developers of various skill sets.
Maintained development, staging and production servers on DigitalOcean, Rackspace and Amazon Web Services.

workHistory.title: Senior Web Developer
notableSuccesses: Developed two box subscription sites for Wal-Mart that generated over 188k users and $2.1M in less than a year.
Created a system for internal documentation of clients, projects, processes.
Lead and implemented team building and best practice exercises as well as optimization techniques.
Launched a tiered hosting support system for customers - complete with ticketing system, site and server up-times tied to Rackspace Cloud and Pingdom APIs, and 24-hour support.
Wrote 'Is It Time To Drop Support for Internet Explorer 8', a blog post that generated 18.7k+ visitors (17.4k+ unique) since February 2014 - ~42% of traffic to the website. [as of July 21, 2015.]

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I approach every web design project with passion and determination, from initial research and data analysis to post-launch support. I deliver smooth, mobile-friendly customer experiences, and yield strong results in improved website performance, SEO, and conversions.

services.title: Voice Assistants
services.description: Want to know about local school closings, have Alexa control your smart home, or even tell you horrible Dad jokes? If you have an idea for a custom Alexa skill, I can help bring that idea to reality and get it published to the Amazon marketplace.

services.title: Consultation
services.description: Need someone to provide recommendations and guidance on technologies, services, and systems? My guidance can range from improving IT policies through training to implementing entirely new systems and servers to address your organization's current and future IT needs.

services.title: Touch Panels
services.description: Are you in need of an touch screen presentation for your store front or conference booth? I can help you engage your customers with an interactive touch panel experience.

services.title: Email Marketing
services.description: Email marketing is a cheap and effective way to reach your customers, build a community and increase sales. Engage subscribers, nurture leads and track results with beautiful, responsive emails.

services.title: Let's Work Together
services.description: Looking for a website? Need an engaging email to drive customers to your site? Just asking for advice? I can't wait to tackle whatever challenge you are having.
